a-tool-for-converting-txt-format-text-fi: A powerful and elegant tool for converting text files into beautifully formatted EPUB e-books. Perfect for publishers, writers, and readers to transform plain text documents into professional-quality digital books.
extracts-the-first-800-characters-from-a: Extracts the first 800 characters from a TXT file and returns the filename
path-to-the-txt-file-to-read: Path to the TXT file to read
first-800-characters-extracted-from-the-: First 800 characters extracted from the file
base-name-of-the-input-file-without-path: Base name of the input file without path
converts-txt-book-files-to-epub-format-w: Converts TXT book files to EPUB format with smart TOC detection and optional LLM-powered analysis
path-to-the-txt-file-to-convert: Path to the TXT file to convert
directory-where-the-epub-file-will-be-sa: Directory where the EPUB file will be saved
book-title-optional-auto-detected-if-not: Book title (optional, auto-detected if not provided)
author-name-optional-auto-detected-if-no: Author name (optional, auto-detected if not provided)
confidence-threshold-for-llm-trigger-0-0: Confidence threshold for LLM trigger (0.0-1.0, lower = more often)
llm-confidence-threshold-for-confirming-: LLM confidence threshold for confirming TOC exists (0.0-1.0)
LLM confidence threshold for confirming no TOC (0.0-1.0)
minimum-score-for-toc-detection-0-100-hi: Minimum score for TOC detection (0-100, higher = stricter)
maximum-lines-to-scan-for-toc-detection-: Maximum lines to scan for TOC detection (50-1000)
converts-txt-files-to-epub-with-automati: Converts TXT files to EPUB with automatic book info detection and cover image download
txt-file-to-convert-to-epub: TXT file to convert to EPUB
output-directory-for-the-epub-file: Output directory for the EPUB file
book-title-auto-detected-from-content-if: Book title (auto-detected from content if omitted)
author-name-auto-detected-from-content-i: Author name (auto-detected from content if omitted)
path-to-the-generated-epub-file: Path to the generated EPUB file
batch-converts-all-txt-files-in-a-folder: Batch converts all TXT files in a folder to EPUB format with optional metadata
folder-containing-txt-files-to-convert: Folder containing TXT files to convert
output-directory-for-generated-epub-file: Output directory for generated EPUB files
array-of-generated-epub-file-paths: Array of generated EPUB file paths
